CardDescription: Revive one KO'd ally with full HP.
FlavorText: You're fine now. The pain's gone. -Hime

CardDescription: All allies gain a damage reduction of 2 during their next battle.
FlavorText: Geez, you're going overboard. -Suguri

CardDescription: During this battle, gain +3 ATK.
FlavorText: I'll commence... my vacation now. -Sora

CardDescription: During this battle, damage taken by both sides is doubled.
FlavorText: Mimyuu! Who did this to you... -Tomato

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 1 chapter\nRoll two dice for movement, battle, bonus and drop.
FlavorText: I'm accelerating. -Suguri

CardDescription:
?Cost: (X) x10. If this card is Affluence (4):
Active players battle you in a random order. They gain -3 ATK. You cannot attack. If you are not KO'd, opponent gives you (their Lvl) x 10 stars.
If not Affluence (4): Upgrade this card.
If not held by Fernet, this card becomes New Nobility.
FlavorText: You wish to ask me for a favor...? My my, of course I'd be ever so happy to help a friend. -Fernet

CardDescription: Every unit except your own receives 1 to 3 damage. Gain 15 stars on every KO.
FlavorText: Hmph, go down, all of you. -Fernet

CardDescription: Heal target player to full HP and gain 10 stars per healed HP. In even-numbered chapters, this card turns into Devil Hand.
FlavorText: This is the power of mercy. -Yuuki

CardDescription: ?Cost: All held stars.\nGain +1 ATK and DEF and an additional +1 ATK and DEF for every 20 stars spent on this card.
FlavorText: With you gone, I am their ultimate weapon now. -Nath

CardDescription: Until end of turn, roll 5 for move, battle, bonus or drop. This card can also be used as a Battle card.
FlavorText: I'll commence... my operation now. -Sora

CardDescription: ?Cost: Stars / 10.\nCan only play Gift cards. Using this card sends it to another player.\nDiscards entire hand upon discard.
FlavorText: Manager, it's your turn!! -Chris

CardDescription: When another player loses stars from an Encounter panel battle and those stars would go to the Encounter panel unit, you will receive them instead. If this effect is triggered, discard this card at the end of your turn. If several players carry Beast Witch, the stars are split between them.
FlavorText: All beasts! Obey me! -Teotoratta

CardDescription: During this battle, gain +1 to ATK, DEF and EVD for every HP you are missing.
FlavorText: Syura's powers go beyond Hell itself! Allow me to demonstrate! -Syura

CardDescription: Every unit on this and 2 adjacent squares takes 2 damage, +1 for every 2 chapters since setting the trap. On KO, half of their stars go to the player who set this trap.
FlavorText: Mauuuuuryaaaaaaahh! -Saki

CardDescription: Deal 3 damage to target enemy. If KO'd, you gain wins as though KO'd in battle.\nThis card becomes "Rocket Cannon" when you use another card or you suffer KO.
FlavorText: Go! -Marc

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nAll Units except yours will skip their next turn. Apply "Bound" to all active enemies. Effect Duration: 2 Chapters. Gain -2 EVD and -1 MOV.
FlavorText: I don't like doing this sort of thing. -Hime

CardDescription: Inflicts Blazing! on units within 2 panels. Effect Duration: 3 Chapters. ATK +1, DEF -1. Effect expires on KO. This effect can stack.
FlavorText: Good! Good! This feeling really is the best! -Kae

CardDescription: During this battle, gain ATK and DEF but lose EVD equal to the number of cards in your hand.
FlavorText: I'm gonna settle this! -Peat

CardDescription: ?Cost: Number of cards held x5\nTurn all your cards, including this one, into "Rbit Hobby Shop."\nYou may play one more card in this turn.
FlavorText: Phaaw... -Arthur

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nSwap unit's base ATK and DEF. Lasts until KO, or Cast Off is used again.
FlavorText: This calls for a good distraction... -Kyousuke

CardName: Chef, I Could Use Some Help!
CardDescription: Summon Chef. Fights battles on behalf of your unit. Gives 2 Wins on KO. Gives stars gained in battle to your unit. Effect ends with Chef's KO. This card turns to "Manager, I Could Use Some Help!" if you have 4 or more Store Manager Counters and your Lvl is 4 or higher.
FlavorText: Chef! I'm going to need your help! -Chris

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x5\nAll players recover your Lvl x HP.\nGain 5 stars for each HP recovered.
FlavorText: It's meal time! -Natsumi

CardDescription: Stock Effect (3)\nCancel a trap, a battle, or drop panel. Take 1 damage. Consumes 1 stack. Effect expires on KO.
FlavorText: What a piece of junk, huh... -Kyoko

CardDescription: On successful Evasion, deal damage to the opponent equal to what you would have taken from them.\nIf used by Hime (Moonlight) during full moon (every 5 chapters), deal double that damage but cannot use the Defend command.
FlavorText: Now let us dance. -Hime

CardDescription: Take 2 damage. The player who set this card gains 1 HP. Stock Effect: During next battle, gain -2 ATK.\nNo effect on the player who set this card.
FlavorText: Dance, long-eared beasts! -Krilalaris

CardDescription: All other units receive the following effect until your next turn: All dice rolls will be 1.
FlavorText: If you insist on staying here, I'll take you back no matter how! -Sham

CardDescription: During this battle, gain a total of +7 points to ATK, DEF, and/or EVD, distributed randomly.
FlavorText: No matter what, you can't escape my Bits. -Nanako

CardDescription: Lower a random player's HP to 1 and gain 10 stars per lowered HP. In odd-numbered chapters, this card turns into Angel Hand.
FlavorText: Eat the power of the devil! -Yuuki

CardName: Do Pirates Fly in the Sky?
CardDescription: Set "Flying Pirate" on 2-3 random panels.
FlavorText: There ain't no law against pirates flying in the sky. -Tequila

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x10\nEffect Duration: 2 chapters. Gain +X ATK, +Y DEF, and +Z EVD, where X = Your total Norma completed, Y = your number of Wins Norma completed, and Z = your number of Star Norma completed.
FlavorText: Receive my miracle! -Ellie

CardDescription: Draw a trap card from the deck. Set all trap cards in hand on random panels. If not holding any trap cards, draw 3 from the deck and set a random one on your current panel.
FlavorText: Fear my powers! -Yuki

CardDescription: This card cannot be played.\nWhen holding this card, take 3 damage at the end of your turn, and remove this card from the game.
FlavorText: You fell for it! Eat it!! -Mimyuu

CardDescription: Place 4 "Evil Spy Work - Execution" cards at random positions in the Center Deck.
FlavorText: Fear Mimyuu's pranks. -Mimyuu

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x5\nDeal 1 damage to another random unit. If KO'd, gain 1 win. Repeat as many times as your current level.
FlavorText: I'll shoot you all down. -Iru

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 1 chapter\nRoll 6 for movement, battle, bonus and drop.
FlavorText: I'd appreciate it if you dropped your weapons. -Sora

CardDescription: KO all units with 1 HP and gain stars equal to 25x the number of KO'd units.
FlavorText: Just hold still, I'll fix you up real quick. -Kiriko

CardDescription: Fight a Pirate Crew Member summoned by the player who set this card. The enemy will attack first. No effect on the player who set this card.
FlavorText: Captain! -Pirate Minion

CardDescription: Roll a die and move result x 3 panels. Deal damage equal to the result to each unit you pass during the move. If they are KO'd by the damage, gain Wins as though from a normal battle. After this effect, your turn ends.
FlavorText: I'll go fast and cut my way through! -Alicianrone

CardDescription: A randomly chosen unit is KO'd.
FlavorText: Why not use this to decide whose turn it is? -Yuki

CardDescription: If target is Chicken, Stock Effect (3). Drop Panels will act as Bonus Panels.\nOtherwise, Stock Effect (3).\nBonus Panels will act as Drop Panels.
FlavorText: Cluuuuck! -Chicken

CardDescription: Stock Effect.\nRoll 2 dice for everything except for battle. This effect ends when you stop on your own Home panel. Can only check Norma on own Home panel.
FlavorText: *Cheep cheep*! Cook wants to go this way. -Cook

CardDescription: Gain +2 ATK during this battle. If your unit suffers KO during this battle, you give no stars or Wins and the unit will revive next turn.
FlavorText: HYPER MODE! -QP

CardDescription: Place an Invasion trap on each Home panel that has no active trap.\nEach player will battle a robotic wild unit during their next 2 encounters, and this robotic unit will gain +1 ATK. This effect can stack.
FlavorText: Everything's under my control. -Shifu

CardDescription:
Effect Duration: 2 Chapters
Cannot move.
Gain +2 DEF. Can counterattack.
Enemies who move into the same panel must battle you.
FlavorText: With this power, everything in the sky will be ours. -Guild Master

CardDescription:
Gain one of the following effects depending on the top-of-the-deck card:
Event +3 ATK
Boost +3 DEF
Others +3 EVD
FlavorText: I can see through everything! -Arnelle

CardDescription: Reduces HP to 1. Does not affect the player who set the trap. Only visible to the player who used this card.
FlavorText: Because I am Star Breaker, the blasting fuse to the world's end. -Star Breaker

CardDescription: Move to an enemy and attack them.\nTarget gains -1 DEF.\nAfter the battle, your turn ends.
FlavorText: Squaawk! -Seagull

CardDescription: Warp to the marked panel and unmark it. Apply Binding Smoke to enemies within 1 panel radius. If no marked panels exist, this card becomes "Leap through Space (Marking)."
FlavorText: Poof. -Mira

CardDescription: Mark the panel where your unit is. When a marked panel exists, this card becomes "Leap through Space." This card is not discarded upon use.
FlavorText: Poof. -Mira

CardDescription: During this battle, gain +1 ATK. Additionally, gain +X ATK where X is the damage you have taken during this battle.
FlavorText: Stop bullying Daddy! -Mescal

CardDescription:
Can only be played with 2 HP or less. Gain one of the following effects at random:
-Roll a die and gain the die number x 20 stars.
-Draw 5 cards.
-Heal to full HP and permanently gain +1 ATK, +1 DEF, and +1 EVD. This effect can only trigger once.
FlavorText: Ugh... Lulu's about to lay an egg... -Lulu

CardDescription: KO all units on any other panel in the same uninterrupted column or row as the panel your unit is on. You gain stars from each KO'd unit as though KO'd in battle. Then end your turn.
FlavorText: Inferno! -Mio

CardDescription: All units whose HP is full or higher will suffer KO. Gain -1 REC on next Revive roll for each enemy KO'd.
FlavorText: Disappear. -Tomomo

CardDescription: For each missing HP, random enemy takes 1 damage. If a unit is KO'd, you gain 1 Win.\nWhen not held by Tomomo (Sweet Eater), this card becomes Miracle Red Bean Ice Cream.
FlavorText: It's Magical Revenge time! -Tomomo

CardName: Manager, I Could Use Some Help!
CardDescription: Summon Store Manager. Fights battles on behalf of your unit. Gives 2 Wins on KO. Gives stars gained in battle to your unit. Effect ends with Store Manager's KO, and your Store Manager Counters reset to 0. This card turns to "Chef, I Could Use Some Help!" if you have less than 4 Store Manager Counters.
FlavorText: Manager, help me! -Chris

CardDescription: ?Cost: Number of cards held by other players x5\nAll other players discard and replace a card from their hand. Reverse all enemy cards.
FlavorText: How foolish you are to have challenged a God. Prepare to taste your bitter defeat! -Sweet Breaker

CardDescription:
+1 ATK while this card is held.
Tomomo (Casual): When played, turn into Tomomo (Sweet Eater) and fully restore HP.
Tomomo (Sweet Eater): When held, this card becomes Magical Revenge.
Discard upon use.
FlavorText: Miracle red bean ice cream! -Tomomo

CardDescription: Turn all your cards, including this one, into random Hyper cards.\nYou may play one more card this turn.
FlavorText: Hooray! Nico will try her best! -Nico

CardDescription: Stock Effect: All opposing units randomly gain -1 ATK, DEF or EVD during their next battle.\nIf held by Fernet, this card can be transformed into "Affluence (1)" instead.
FlavorText: Pleased to make your acquaintance. I hope we can get along well in the future. -Fernet

CardDescription: Add 2 random Boost/Event cards that deal damage to your hand.\nYou may play another card this turn.
FlavorText: Now then, let's see how this will turn out. -Suguri

CardDescription: A boss appears. If a boss is already on the field, treat this card as a battle card: Cancel any battle card the opponent selected. End the battle and start a new battle where opponent fights the Boss instead. Can only use against players.
FlavorText: Hahaha! Here comes my friend! -NoName

CardDescription: Set "Dance, Long-Eared Beasts!" trap on 3-5 random panels.
FlavorText: Dance, long-eared beasts! -Krilalaris

CardDescription: All players draw cards until they have a full hand. Those with full hand draw 1 card instead. Gain stars equal to 10x the number of all cards drawn.
FlavorText: Presents for good boys and girls. -Aru

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 3 chapters\nWhen you are allowed to attack first, the opposing unit cannot attack (once per combat).
FlavorText: This is the privilege of the main character! -Kai

CardDescription: Gain +1 Rage Counter. Target another active unit and enter Raging Mode: gain +X ATK and +X EVD where X is the number of your Rage Counters. Raging Mode ends and Rage Counters become 0 upon target's KO. Gain +2 Wins if you KO target in battle, and -50% Stars and Wins if you KO any other unit.
FlavorText: Gyaoooh! -Maynie

CardDescription: Pay X stars to the player who set this card, where X is the Lvl of the player who set this card. Draw a card from the deck. This card remains on board when triggered but can be replaced by a new trap. No effect on the player who set this trap.
FlavorText: All right, it's time to open the shop. -Arthur

CardDescription:
Base ATK is 0 in this battle.
Absorb up to 2 damage.
Gain an additional +2 ATK for every damage absorbed.
Can only be used when defending.
FlavorText: Enemy detected. Destroying. -Robo Ball

CardDescription: Add a copy of the two most recent cards in the discard pile that aren't "Reproduction of Records" to your hand. Those cards will be treated as being Level 1 and having no base cost while in your hand.
FlavorText: Sumika's sweet memory! -Sumika

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x3\nEffect Duration: 3 Chapters.\nTurn all Drop Panels into Bonus Panels and Encounter and Boss Panels into Draw Panels. -1 ATK when on a marked panel.
FlavorText: The dream you protected has spread across the whole planet. -Suguri

CardDescription: Battle target player. You attack first. During battle, gain +1 ATK.
FlavorText: Just like you... I have my battles to fight. -Islay

CardDescription: Choose one of the following two effects to activate:\n1. This card becomes "Big Rocket Cannon".\n2. Deal 1 damage to target enemy. If KO'd, you gain wins as though KO'd in battle.
FlavorText: Red Barrel... It's time to use that! -Marc

CardDescription: Lose 5 stars at the start of each turn. Ignore Drop panels, traps, and card effect damage. This effect ends when you stop on your own Home panel or have less than 5 stars.
FlavorText: Now, let's get going. -Halena

CardDescription: Stock Effect (3). In a battle where you attack first, gain -1 ATK and +1 DEF for every 2 stock, and +1 ATK per stock. This effect can stack.
FlavorText: I'm going to use my saint eyes! -Kyupita

CardDescription: During standby, you may choose another card of usable Lvl to send to another random player. Gain stars equal to Card Lvl x5. Target cannot challenge players to a battle until your next turn. This card is discarded upon KO or use.
FlavorText: Children of the world, we are coming for you! -Aru

CardDescription: On KO, also KO the opponent. Enemy gains no stars or wins, and loses half of their stars.
FlavorText: I'm sorry... I can't make it back... -Alte

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 1 chapter.\nTake no damage.
FlavorText: No flimsy attacks can hurt me! -Miusaki

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x10\nGo to Live Mode for (your Lvl) turns. Gain -3 MOV, can only trigger movement type panels and cannot use cards. Cannot be challenged or be the target of Boost cards. If an opponent ends their turn in 2 panel radius, steal (your Lvl) x5 stars from them. Ends on KO.
FlavorText: We are the strongest idols! -Sora & Sham

CardDescription: Set "Invisible Bomb" on 3-5 random panels.
FlavorText: Because I am Star Breaker, the blasting fuse to the world's end. -Star Breaker

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 3 Chapters.\nWhenever another player gains stars from a panel or battle KO, they gain up to your Lvl fewer stars, and you gain your Lvl stars. Effect expires on KO.
FlavorText: Fufufu, look how many stars I have here. -Reika

CardDescription:
Effect Duration: 3 chapters.
Cannot be challenged to battle or targeted by Boost cards by other players.
Do not trigger Encounter or Boss panels.
Effect expires on entering battle.
Gain +2 ATK when entering battle.
FlavorText: Look at me vanish! -Tsih

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x5\nEffect Duration: Player level\nTurn 4-6 panels into Warp Move panels and then warp to one of them.
FlavorText: Po! Po! Po! Popoppo!! -Marie Poppo

CardDescription: Draw 2 cards with "Pudding" in their name from the center deck.
FlavorText: My little... pudding... -QP

CardDescription: Deal 4 damage to players within 2 panels of you.\nFor each player KO'd, gain 2 wins and KO'd Player's Lvl x10 stars.\nWhen not carrying "Red & Blue", this card becomes "White Christsmasher".
FlavorText: White Christsmasher! -Mei, Red & Blue

CardDescription:
Drop to 1 HP.
Gain +1 ATK per lost HP.
Effect Duration: As many Chapters as lost HP.
Lose 1 ATK per turn for the duration.
Effect expires on KO.
FlavorText: Rumble rumble rumble. -Shifu Robot

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x7\nEffect Duration: (Your Lvl) x Chapters\nTurn all Bonus and Draw panels into Encounter panels. If an enemy moves onto an Encounter panel with a Battle card you set as a Trap, they must stop on that panel.
FlavorText: Look at all those countless planes crossing the sky... It's like watching a dream, is it not? -Malt

CardDescription: Move to target unit's panel. In addition, steal stars equal to 10x their level.
FlavorText: Poppo! Poppopopopopo!\n-Marie Poppo

CardDescription: ?Cost: 10 + 10x existing stack of Upshift. Stock Effect (2).\nGain +1 MOV. This effect can be stacked (max 6).\nIf you end your turn without moving to the end of your final move roll, lose a stack of Upshift.
FlavorText: ...Don't follow me. -Lone Rider

CardDescription: During this battle, gain ATK and DEF but lose EVD equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand.
FlavorText: Revenge! -Tomato

CardDescription: Fight all other players in order. The enemy goes first. During battle, gain +1 EVD.
FlavorText: We just want to fly around freely. -Sherry

CardDescription: Discard your current hand and deal 2 damage to players within 1 panel of you.\nFor each player KO'd, gain a win and KO'd Player's Lvl x5 stars.\nWhen carrying "Red & Blue", this card becomes "True White Christsmasher".
FlavorText: White Christsmasher! -Mei

CardDescription: Stop target unit's next move action.
FlavorText: No one can get out of Repa's hair. -Ceoreparque

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x10\nDeals damage equal to your level to target unit. A KO from this effect gives you 2 Wins.
FlavorText: Charged! Go! -Marc

CardDescription: Gain Freight cards equal to your level. With Freight cards in your hand, this card can be played as a Battle card: During this battle, gain +1 ATK for every Freight card in your hand.
FlavorText: Breaking the load regulations, you say? I have a permit right here! -Merchant

CardDescription: Effect duration: 3 Chapters Immune to instant KO effects. When staying on a panel with another player at the end of either player's turn, gain a copy of a random card in their hand. You can neither challenge nor be challenged; instead, opponents may stop to Pet you. Effect expires on KO.
FlavorText: *Wimper* -Pomeranius

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 3 Chapters. Gain +2 DEF. The maximum stacks of Hardened Scales are increased to 10. If you gain 10 stacks of Hardened Scales, all other players suffer KO.
FlavorText: Th-that's dangerous� I'm sorry. -Watty

CardDescription: Set "Sweet Indulgence" trap on 3-5 random panels.
FlavorText: "This is the power of a Sweet God!" -Sweet Creator

CardDescription: Turn all your cards into random non-Hyper, Sweets type cards.
FlavorText: "I am about to stuff you with sweets, whether you like it or not." -Sweet Creator

CardDescription: Set "Sweet Indulgence" trap face-up on 3-5 random panels.
FlavorText: "This is the power of a Sweet God!" -Sweet Creator

CardDescription: Heal 1 HP and gain +2 ATK per Sweets type card in hand during this battle. Discard all Sweets type cards.
FlavorText: "Sweets power is the best!" -Saki

CardDescription: Draw 3 Boost cards from the deck. You can play up to 3 more Boost cards this turn for 1/3 of their cost.
FlavorText: "Ehehe, let's have a lot of delicious sweets." -Natsumi

CardDescription: Deal X+1 damage to all other players and the Boss, where X is your Waking count. Remove all Waking stocks. Gain 1 HP for every 2 Waking stock removed.
FlavorText: "The time is about to come for me to say good morning..." -Krilalaris

CardDescription:
When you cancel exactly 1 damage in battle while holding this card, gain a stock of Waking. (Max 4. Does not stack.)
Transform to When My Slumber Breaks upon use.
FlavorText: "I suggest you keep quiet for your own safety..." -Krilalaris

CardDescription: Move to your Home panel without activating it. Cannot be challenged or be the target of other players' Boost cards. Immune to Trap cards, instant KO effects, and card damage from other players. Roll 2 dice for movement. Effect ends after traveling 20 panels.
FlavorText: "Pitter-patter, pitter-patter!" -Mimyuu

CardDescription: Effect Duration: Player level. Gain Lvl x1 stars for every point of damage you take. If the effect ends or is replaced while active, heal all damage taken during the effect. Effect ends on KO.
FlavorText: "This is a Mother's love, poppo." -Mother Poppo

CardDescription:
Can only be played with 2 HP or less. Trigger one of the following effects at random:
-Roll a die. All other players lose the die number x (their Lvl) stars.
-All other players discard a card at random.
-All other players' HP is lowered to 2.
FlavorText: "Lulu is... an unlucky dragon..." -Dark Lulu

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 2 chapters. Gain +X ATK in battle when attacker, and +X DEF and +X EVD when defender. X = your total Norma completed.
FlavorText: "I'll show you my strongest power ?" -Hyper Ellie

CardDescription: Lower your HP to 1. Effect Duration: 3 chapters. Gain +4 ATK and +5 EVD.
FlavorText: "You can't make an adult go overboard." -Hero Kai

CardDescription: Pay all stocked Cannonball Counters. Deal 1 damage to a random enemy. If the enemy is KO'd, gain 1 Win and Stars equal to 10x their level. Repeat this once for every Cannonball Counter paid.
FlavorText: "All guns at the ready... FIRE!" -Grain

CardDescription: Target another active player. Next time they are challenged or challenge a unit while you are active, take their place in the battle. Gain +3 ATK, DEF and EVD at the start of the battle. You may only have this effect on one player at a time.
FlavorText: "We just want to fly in the sky the way we want." -Bourbon

CardDescription:
Effect Duration: 1 Chapter.
Double your natural die rolls for Attack, Defense, Evade, Move, Bonus and Drop.
FlavorText: "Our deep, vibrant youth begins now!" -Poyo

CardName: I'll Get a Little Into It
CardDescription: Until end of turn, gain +X ATK, where X is your level. Gain no stars from defeating enemies. The first time you defeat a player in battle while this effect is active, gain 2 Wins.
FlavorText: "I guess I'll let you see a glimpse of my mettle." -Chuu

CardDescription: Effect duration: 3 chapters. Revive all players currently suffering KO with full HP. If another player suffers KO, they recover instantly with full HP. For each player revived, gain their Lvl x 5 stars. This star gain effect can stack.
FlavorText: "Let's hype up the game together!" -Haruka

CardDescription:
Target another player.
Choose a card type (Battle/Boost/Event/Other), then declare a card type.
If the next card played by target player is the Chosen type: gain 2 Wins and Lvl x 10 stars.
Declared only: take 2 damage.
FlavorText: "I can see what cards you're holding." -Kanata

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 2 to 5 chapters\nAble to discern all monster locations for the duration of the effect.
FlavorText: It will greatly ease your expedition... if it works long enough! -Armorer

CardDescription: Heal 2 HP every turn until your next KO. The effect cannot stack.
FlavorText: Fluffiness will conquer the world! -Sky Baker

CardDescription: For this battle, gain 5 HP and +1 ATK, DEF, EVD.
FlavorText: Fufufu, this pure water will cure your thirst, you have my word on it! -Innkeeper

CardDescription: Throw a lure on a panel around you (radius 3). All panels around in 1 panel radius will turn into encounter panels for 3 chapters.
FlavorText: The smell of this thing should be strong enough to attract most small fry around the place... -Alchemist

CardDescription: Effect duration: 3 chapters\nHeal 1 HP every turn. The effect is removed upon getting KO'd, and cannot stack.
FlavorText: No one can ever bake something better than this masterpiece. -Star Baker

CardDescription: Throw a slimebomb on a panel around you (radius 3). All panels in 1 panel radius will be covered with Goo for 2 chapters.
FlavorText: Pure goo in a bottle, ready to throw! -Alchemist

CardDescription: Forget your past mistakes and trigger a Bounty Battle. Can only be used on a panel with a discovered monster location. You must possess the bounty to start the battle. Your turn ends after playing this card.
FlavorText: Don't let it run away! -Alchemist

CardDescription: Teleport on any panel, then play your turn.
FlavorText: One sip, and poof! -Alchemist

CardDescription: When held: Pick up 2x chocolate.\nWhen played in battle: Steal 200 chocolate for each damage dealt.\nThis card is discarded upon KO or use.
FlavorText: Here comes another cute and sweet battle! -QP

CardDescription: Roll double dice for attack.
FlavorText: Unlimited Charge! -Sora

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 3 chapters.\nAll players gain +1 EVD and -1 DEF.
FlavorText: Girls are leaping through the sky...-

CardDescription: Engage in battle with another player or players on your panel. Once these battles are over, your turn is over.
FlavorText: Owwwww!! -Sham

CardDescription: Battle the player who set this card, starting with their attack.
FlavorText: I'll make you leave the guild today for sure! -Peat

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x5\nPerform a Norma check, then your turn ends.\nCan only be used by the player with the lowest level. Cannot be used at Norma level 5.
FlavorText: Here's what you asked for. ?Captain Tequila\n"Great work! I knew I could count on a real villain like you!" -Mimyuu

CardDescription: Discard a random card.
FlavorText: Pudding with soy sauce, tastes like sea urchin! -Yuki

CardDescription: Roll to move again without activating this panel.
FlavorText: Thought you'd found a banana? Too bad, it was just me, Nanako! -Nanako

CardDescription: Pay 1 HP when you use this card. During this battle, gain +2 ATK. If you would suffer KO from using this card, the card cannot be used.
FlavorText: Go! Big Magnum! -Captain Tequila

CardDescription: Lose 1 HP at the start of your turn. Heal 1 HP for every damage you deal. Cannot Norma while holding this card. This card is discarded upon KO or use.
FlavorText: The true power of my beast... I wonder if it's like this. -Krilalaris

CardDescription: Discard all Hyper cards in hand. Lose 10 stars and heal 1 HP for each discarded card.
FlavorText: Noooo, Mr. Cow! Mr. Frog! ?Yuuki\n"Hahahaha! Wail and weep!!" -Yuki

CardDescription: A randomly chosen unit will receive 2 damage.
FlavorText: Squaawk! -Seagull

CardDescription: Gain 7 stars for every trap you have set and someone has stepped on.
FlavorText: Yay, I've got my pay! ?Chris\n"Don't waste it, okay?" -Manager

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nYour next turn will be skipped.
FlavorText: 'One glance is all it took for that pudding to steal my heart.'

CardDescription: Gain +2 ATK, enemy gains -2 DEF. For every point of damage you would deal, steal 5 stars from your opponent instead.
FlavorText: 'Extortion' - An act of monetary gain by inflicting violence upon a weaker target.

CardDescription: For this turn, roll two dice for movement.
FlavorText: Faster! -Suguri

CardDescription: If opponent uses a battle card in this battle, if not restricted by player order its effect is applied as though you played it instead. If successful, opponent does not pay the card cost.
FlavorText: The train's full of dangerous stuff?! -Tomato

CardDescription: For this battle, randomly roll either a natural 1 or 6 for each attack, defense and evasion.
FlavorText: Poor Blue Crow. You loaded him with all that heavy stuff! -Marc

CardDescription: Heals all units for 3 HP.
FlavorText: Let's have supper together. -Natsumi

CardDescription: When this card is activated either on Bonus, Drop, Draw or Encounter, that panel's effect takes place twice.
FlavorText: Encore! Encore!

CardDescription: Exchange the cards in your hand, your stars and your current panel position with the player who set this card.
FlavorText: Heavy... ?Suguri\n"So drafty without my cap..." -Marc

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nAfter suffering KO, you will revive on the following turn.
FlavorText: All good for now! -Marc

CardDescription: Gain the effect of one randomly chosen Battle card (including Hyper cards).
FlavorText: It's my job to kill you. -Nath

CardDescription: This battle will last until either unit suffers KO (Maximum of 10 rounds).
FlavorText: To protect everyone!\n-Suguri & Hime

CardDescription: KO's a player. If the player has any cards in their hand, they will lose all of them instead of suffering KO.
FlavorText: Heeehaaaaah! -Punk

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nNext time you land on a drop panel, the player(s) with the highest number of stars will lose the same number of stars as you.

CardName: For the Future of the Toy Store
CardDescription: Lose half your stars. The player who set this card will gain the lost stars. This card can only be used with less than 50 stars.
FlavorText: If only! If only there was no Santa! -Arthur

CardDescription: All units suffering KO are revived with 1 HP.
FlavorText: You'll all be up in a jiffy. -Kiriko

CardDescription: Choose a player with full HP and battle them. Your turn ends after the battle.
FlavorText: Take this! -Guildmaster

CardDescription: All cards are gathered from the players and dealt back randomly. The total number of each player's cards remains unchanged.
FlavorText: A gift exchange? Let's do it!\n-Rbit, Red and Blue

CardDescription: You are moved to a randomly chosen panel.
FlavorText: Ahaha, I like this. -Nanako

CardDescription: Stock Effect(1):\nIn the next battle, gain -2 DEF.
FlavorText: All I need to do is dodge every attack! -Suguri

CardDescription: All players are moved to randomly chosen panels.
FlavorText: To the next world! -Marie Poppo

CardDescription: Permanent Effect\nStart-of-chapter bonus stars are increased by one.
FlavorText: Aha, that's why it's a party night. -Hime

CardDescription: At the start of your next turn, randomly swap home panel positions. The first player to land on each home draws a card.
FlavorText: Sumika's going to build herself a nice and cozy home. -Sumika

CardDescription: The player who set this trap moves to the panel on which the trap was activated. The player who activated the trap then gains this card instead of it being discarded.
FlavorText: Kyupita... I want to see you. -Kyousuke

CardDescription: During this battle,\ngain +1 ATK and -1 DEF.
FlavorText: Let's play our lives away! -Kae

CardDescription: Effect Duration: Infinite.\nA random unit takes 1 damage. At the start of your turn, repeat this effect. The effect ends when a unit suffers KO.
You will have an encounter. The enemy will attack first.
FlavorText: What, I was attacked...? -Suguri

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 3 chapters\nOffense and defense will happen twice in all battles.
FlavorText: I believe... I have the power to stop this... -Suguri

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nAlways roll 5 to move. After your turn, take 1 damage. Effect expires on KO.\nIf you suffer KO from this effect, pay Lvl x5 stars.
FlavorText: 'You guys'? You're mistaken...\nI ride alone! -Lone Rider

CardDescription: Deals 1 damage to the selected enemy unit.
FlavorText: I can hit you from anywhere. -Iru

CardDescription: Move backwards while this card is held. Cannot Norma while holding this card. This card is discarded upon KO or use.
FlavorText: Where am I? -Tsih

CardDescription: Gain Lvl x1 stars at the start of your turn. You cannot use any other cards. This card is discarded upon use. On defeat, give Lvl x 3 more stars.
FlavorText: Woo-hoo, so many stars! Today's my day!! -Tomomo

CardDescription: While holding this card, your natural die rolls can range from 0 to 7, and the minimum roll result is 0 when rolling 0.\nCannot perform a Norma check after rolling a 0 for move on the same turn.
FlavorText: I can even control my dice rolls. -Yuki

CardDescription: When a non-battle effect deals any damage to you, that damage is reduced by 1, and you lose Lvl x 2 stars.
FlavorText: What a timid generation we live in. -Sherry

CardDescription: Choose a player. All hyper cards in your hand become the type that that player uses.
FlavorText: Marie Poppo is trying to become something else.

CardDescription: Deals 1 damage.
FlavorText: Thank you for dying! -Mimyuu

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 3 chapters\nAll panels other than the home panels become random panels.
FlavorText: A hole in the wall-like force between dimensions... it would appear that this phenomenon is mixing the worlds themselves together. -Yukito

CardDescription: Stock Effect.\nThe next bonus panel gives you twice as many stars.
FlavorText: We've got a bunch. -Aru

CardDescription: Draw 2 cards.
FlavorText: You're going to help me deliver the presents. -Aru

CardDescription: A boss will show up.
FlavorText: Machines have friends too. -NoName

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 1 chapter\nNo player may use any cards.
FlavorText: Ran out of ammo! -Peat

CardDescription: For this turn, roll 3 dice for movement. Skip next turn.
FlavorText: I-I have no complaints as long as I get paid... -Chris

CardDescription: All units are randomly warped onto the same panel. End your turn.
FlavorText: At tonight's banquet, the Beasts of Darkness shall dance wildly. -Krilalaris

CardDescription: Look at the first 3 cards of the deck. If there are any hyper cards, take them. Return the rest of the cards to the deck in the same order.
FlavorText: Well, this sort of thing happens all the time. It was quite fun, anyway. -Scholar

CardDescription: Stock Effect (1). Choose an active unit. If that unit moves onto a panel with a set Trap, they must stop on that panel.
FlavorText: Nobody will get past Waruda! -Tomato

CardDescription: Each different wild unit gains +1/+1/+1 during its next battle. This effect can stack.
FlavorText: Guys, it's snack time! Come eat! -Syura

CardDescription: Gain stars equal to five times the number of chapters passed since this card was set.
FlavorText: Dad, can't I break the piggy yet? -Mescal

CardDescription: Player suffers 3 random encounters (the player attacks first).
FlavorText: Piyopiyopiyopiyopiyopiyopiyopiyooo! -Colored Piyo Army

CardDescription: Play one random Event card (including Hyper cards) from any other player's hand or the deck, at no additional cost.
FlavorText: We will get golden eggs! ?QP\n"And make the best pudding out of them!" -Saki

CardDescription: Gain -1 DEF. Whenever passing another unit on your turn, steal target Lvl x3 stars from them. Cannot Norma while holding this card. This card is discarded upon KO or use.
FlavorText: Pokyakya!! -Poppo

CardDescription: Stock Effect (1). ATK, DEF and EVD become -1 in your next battle.
FlavorText: Poppo! Poppopopo!!! -Everyone

CardDescription: At the start of this battle, reset your HP to your max HP.
FlavorText: I've got pudding for lunch today! -QP

CardDescription: Steals all the cards from the first player to step on the trap. Gives all the stolen cards to the second player to step on the trap.
FlavorText: These do no good! -Nico

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 1 chapter\nYou may play cards without paying their cost. You may play 1 additional card this turn.
FlavorText: There you guys are... Come to the Student Council Office after school,\nwill you? -Himeji

CardDescription: You may play cards one level higher than your current level. All card costs are increased by 5. This card is discarded on use.
FlavorText: Even if I survive the war... With this body, there's nothing I can do. -Nath

CardDescription: Discard all cards in your hand and draw 3 cards.\nCan only be used when holding only Princess's Privilege or you have at least 3 cards in your hand.
FlavorText: You may come and visit my house some day. -Fernet

CardDescription: Fully restore HP.
FlavorText: Hooray! -QP

CardDescription: All damage taken during the battle will be healed after the battle. Effect is cancelled if the player is KO'd.
FlavorText: I'm not going to die. -Suguri

CardDescription: During this battle, gain +2 EVD and -1 DEF.
FlavorText: Like drawing a rainbow-colored circle.

CardDescription: During this battle, gain +2 DEF. You may not use the Evade command.
FlavorText: Formation Orbit! -QP

CardDescription: During this battle, the positive and negative values of each ability of both units are inverted after adjustment.
FlavorText: Aren't you too serious about this game? You're so da... I mean, far too immature! -Mei

CardDescription: Heals 1 HP.
FlavorText: Have a cookie! -Saki

CardDescription: All active players except the one who played this card must draw cards, paying 15 stars per card, up to their card maximum.
FlavorText: You'll buy it, of course. You'll buy it. Won't you? -Merchant

CardDescription: All players return their hand to the deck, and the deck is shuffled. After 3 chapters, all players draw as many cards as they discarded from this effect.
FlavorText: Wait! Give me back the presents! -Aru

CardDescription: Every unit's HP becomes 1.
FlavorText: Meet the guardian angel of this vessel. -Shifu

CardDescription: For 3 turns, all target's cards are reversed (target sees them face down, and other players can see their cards).
FlavorText: Order within the world...? What the heck does pudding have to do with that!? -QP

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 1 Chapter.\nNo battles can take place.
FlavorText: We have nothing to do... ?Sumika\n"Let's enjoy the peace and quiet." -Suguri

CardDescription: During this battle, ATK, DEF and EVD of both units will be 0.
FlavorText: This battle will be a true test of strength! -Tomomo

CardDescription: Gain +3 DEF during this battle. However, you may not attack. This card can only be used by the player who attacks second.
FlavorText: The most important thing is: make it back here alive. -Sham

CardDescription: Deal damage to attacker equal to their ATK - DEF (min. 1). You take no damage. No attacks take place. May only be played by the defender.
FlavorText: Shield, invert! -Sora

CardDescription: Gain -1 ATK, -1 DEF and -1 EVD. If you win this battle, take 50% more of your opponent's stars.
FlavorText: Alright, it's time to play the long odds! -Yuki

CardDescription: Lose half your stars and fully restore HP.
FlavorText: We have a guest to treat! -Chris

CardDescription: All trap cards on the field are discarded. Trap setters take 1 damage for each discarded trap.
FlavorText: A light capable of burning down the city... even the planet... I can tell its source is up there in the sky. -Sora

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nThis card negates the effect of a trap card. Gain 5 stars per level of cancelled trap.
FlavorText: Such a pain in the neck. -Kyoko

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nAll units gain +2 ATK during their next battle.
FlavorText: This is gonna hurt even if you know it's coming!! -Tomomo

CardDescription: Steal a random "pudding" card from each other player. You may play another card this turn. At the end of your turn, discard as many cards as you gained.
FlavorText: The sweets that bring harm to the world... I will destroy them all! -Sweet Breaker

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x5\nEnd this battle. Attacker gains this card's cost. May only be used by the defender. If opponent plays a battle card, this effect is void.
FlavorText: Farewell! -Tomato

CardName: Tragedy in the Dead of Night
CardDescription: Discard a random card. That card will go to the player who set this card.
FlavorText: 'Such happiness will be snatched away just like that.'

CardDescription: Steal a random card from all players on the same tile as you.
FlavorText: Pokya Po! (Treasure, get!) -Marie Poppo

CardDescription: ?Cost: Level x5\nLose Lvl x1 stars at the start of your turn. Using this card sends it to another player. If Cost is higher than your star count, you may use this card for free.
FlavorText: Pitch black darkness disrupts my slumber, hence I yearn for light... -Krilalaris

CardDescription: Effect Duration: 1 Chapter.\nNo units will gain stars from any sources.
FlavorText: Where's my payment! -Chris

CardDescription: Stock Effect\nYou give double wins on KO from battle. Effect expires on KO.
FlavorText: Over here! My nose is never wrong! -QP

CardDescription: Move all trap cards onto randomly chosen panels.
FlavorText: Useless. No one can beat Tomato. -Tomato

CardDescription: Gain +1 MOV. Cannot Norma while holding this card. Discard upon use.
FlavorText: People call her Barefoot Alicianrone.

CardDescription: The first unit to activate this trap loses Lvl x10 stars. If any stars were lost, the trap stays on board and the lost stars are given to the next player to trigger the trap.
FlavorText: "My money...!" -Kai

CardDescription:
May only be used by the attacker. The battle is decided by a contest of cuteness.
Cuteness = 10 - Max HP - ATK + EVD, but no less than 0.
Instead of rolling for attack, both units roll two dice and add the total to their Cuteness. If one unit has a higher Cuteness, they steal 5x the loser's Lvl stars and gain 1 Win. Then end the battle.
Can only use against players.
FlavorText: "Now tell us, who is the cutest here!?" -Saki

CardDescription:
Summon a random friendly unit on your panel that is an available wild unit type. It gains 1 HP.
The summon will challenge any enemies and gives half of the stars it gains to the summoner. Replaces any previous summon.
FlavorText: "It's nice to relax once in a while." -Teotoratta

CardDescription: Randomly gain +1 ATK, +1 DEF, or +1 EVD at the start of battle while this card is held, and lose 7 stars. This card is discarded upon KO or use.
FlavorText: "What the heck are you doing!" -Nanako

CardDescription:
Effect Duration: 3 chapters.
All players will receive +1 ATK, +1 DEF, and +1 EVD when fighting a player with a higher Lvl than them.
FlavorText: "The Guild will betray you before too long... Keep that in mind." -Sherry

CardDescription: Upon activating the next Warp or Warp Move panel, choose another Warp or Warp Move panel to warp to.
FlavorText: "There's a nice wind blowing around here!" -Cook

CardDescription:
Draw a card. You may play one more card this turn. It can be one level higher than your current level. If you do, discard your hand.
Repeat (1): Draw 1 more card.
FlavorText: "I'm going to go all out." -Nath

CardDescription: Warp to a random panel.
FlavorText: "Halena! This direction is better, trust Cook." -Cook

CardDescription:
Randomly heal 2 HP or take 1 damage.
(Trigger: Go down to 1 HP):
Randomly heal to full HP or set HP to 1.
FlavorText: "This is what we recommend today!" -Chris

CardDescription: After battle card activation, steal a random card from the enemy that wasn't used in this battle.
FlavorText: "Wait up, that's something important to me." -Sora

CardDescription:
Gain +1 ATK.
(Trigger: Suffer KO):
Gain +2 ATK.
FlavorText: "The bigger the trouble, the more fired up I get, I guess?" -Ellie

CardDescription:
Effect Duration: 2 chapters.
Turn all Encounter and Boss Encounter panels into Drop panels. Turn all Bonus panels into Draw panels. Turn all Heal panels into Damage panels.
(Trigger: land on 3 Draw, Damage or Drop panels):
Turn all Encounter and Boss Encounter panels into 2x Drop panels. Turn all Bonus panels into 2x Draw panels. Turn all Heal panels into 2x Damage panels.
FlavorText: "I'll cure the disease this world's suffering from..." -Kiriko

CardDescription:
Deal 3 damage to a random unit.
Repeat (1): Draw a card for each unit KO'd by this card.
Repeat (2): If the unit is KO'd, deal 1 damage to another random unit.
FlavorText: "How do I want to destroy a world this time?" -Mio

CardName: Look How Long My Arms and Legs Are Now
CardDescription: You may pay 5 more stars to place traps within a 2 panel radius. Increase all non-Trap, non-Gift card levels by 1 (up to 5). This card is discarded upon use or landing on a trap.
FlavorText: "Let Mother hug you in these long arms of hers." -Mother Poppo

CardDescription:
If your HP is 1 at the start of the battle, gain +2 ATK.
If you suffer KO in battle where this effect is active, discard this card.
FlavorText: "Alright, I think I have to go a little wild now." -Chuu

CardDescription: When you stop on another player's Home panel, pay (your Lvl) x2 stars to them. If you fail the Norma check, your next turn will be skipped.
FlavorText: "This is such a rip-off..." -Lulu

CardDescription: While playing a card with a damage effect, the first time it damages each unit it deals 1 more damage.
FlavorText: "Can you handle this elegant assault of mine?" -Pomeranius

CardName: Feel the Rush with an Energy Drink
CardDescription: All players gain -1 REC.
FlavorText: "Now we can have fun 'til morning!" -Poyo

CardName: Seagull Friend / Dance of the Seagulls

CardDescription: When holding this card, gain +1 ATK, DEF and EVD in battle.\nOn discard or KO, this card is removed from the game.
FlavorText: We can't do this anymore! -Red & Blue

CardDescription: If the opponent has not played a Battle card, give them a Freight card and cancel the battle. May only be used by the defender.\nWhen stopping on your Home panel, discard this card and gain 5 Stars.
FlavorText: You may keep all that freight, yes you may. -Merchant
